IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: TO PROVIDE SECONDARY EDUCATIONAL, SOCIAL, AND ATHLETIC PROGRAMS TO CHILDREN.
IRS990.MissionDesc: TO PROVIDE YOUNG MEN AND WOMEN WITH THE INTELLECTUAL AND MORAL FOUNDATIONS AND THE LEADERSHIP SKILLS THAT WILL ENABLE THEM TO FLOURISH AS MEMBERS OF A FAMILY AND A COMMUNITY AS THEY CONFRONT THE CHALLENGES OF COLLEGE AND BEYOND.
IRS990.Desc: INSTRUCTION OF APPROXIMATELY 405 HIGH SCHOOL AGED CHILDREN BY APPROXIMATELY 85 QUALIFIED INSTRUCTORS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION HAS A PRACTICE OF PROVIDING ON CAMPUS HOUSING FOR KEY EMPLOYEES WHO NEED TO HAVE DIRECT AND REGULAR CONTACT WITH OUR STUDENTS.

PIETER M. MULDER $10,000 ANDREW BOGARDUS 20,000 JEAN MAHER 10,000 BERKSHIRE SCHOOL SPONSORS A NONQUALIFIED DEFERRED COMPENSATION PLAN COVERING A SELECT GROUP OF EMPLOYEES. ONCE A PARTICIPANT BECOMES VESTED IN THIS NONQUALIFIED DEFERRED PLAN, BY LAW, THE PARTICIPANT IS TAXED ON THE VESTED AMOUNT. THE ABOVE AMOUNTS ARE INCLUDED ON SCHEDULE J, PART II, COLUMN C.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: 27 IS THE NUMBER OF ACTUAL CONTRIBUTIONS MADE

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THIS YEAR'S 990, WITHOUT SCHEDULE B, WAS REVIEWED IN DETAIL BY THE CHIEF FINANCIAL OFFICER AND MEMBERS OF THE AUDIT, RISK AND COMPLIANCE COMMITTEE PRIOR TO THE FILING OF THE RETURN. THE CHIEF FINANCIAL OFFICER AND THE CHAIR OF THE AUDIT, RISK AND COMPLIANCE COMMITTEE REVIEWED SCHEDULE B PRIOR TO THE FILING OF THE 990 RETURN. IN ADDITION, THE FORM 990 WITHOUT SCHEDULE B IS PROVIDED TO THE FULL BOARD FOR THEIR REVIEW PRIOR TO FILING THE RETURN.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ALL MEMBERS OF THE BOARD ARE ANNUALLY ASKED TO READ AND SIGN THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: A COMPENSATION COMMITTEE OF THE BOARD, WHOSE MEMBERS ARE INDEPENDENT, USING COMPARATIVE SALARY INFORMATION FROM SEVERAL SOURCES, MAKES RECOMMENDATIONS TO THE INDEPENDENT MEMBERS OF THE BOARD AND THIS GROUP APPROVES COMPENSATION FOR THE OFFICERS AND KEY EMPLOYEES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE SCHOOL MAKES ITS GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC UPON REQUEST.
